properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INQUIRE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT INQUIRE_NO, INQUIRE_TITLE, INQUIRE_CONTENT, INQUIRE_ENROLL_DATE, INQUIRE_STATUS, INQUIRE_EMAIL, INQUIRE_RESPONSE, RESPONSE_DATE, STATUS, USER_NO, ADMIN_NO, INQUIRE_SEP, INQUIRE_TYPE FROM TB_INQUIRE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
